root: ^We were out clubbing when one of my girlfriends got drunk and started acting ugly. How should I react?
^Make a video of her with my mobile and post it on the Internet
^Call her a taxi to take her home
^I don't care, she's a big girl

res1: ^She got crazy with shame and tried killing herself with sleeping pills. I wonder if this idiot has any brain at all...

^We were out clubbing when one of my girlfriends got drunk and started acting ugly. I posted a video of her online. She got crazy with shame and tried killing herself with sleeping pills, but luckily failed. I wonder if this idiot has any brain at all...
res2: ^She was so grateful to me in the morning, I felt a little confused
^We were out clubbing when one of my girlfriends got drunk and started acting ugly. I called her a taxi to take her home. She was so grateful to me in the morning, I felt a little confused.
res3: ^Next morning, I learnt that she had been beaten up and got into a hospital. Well, I think she got what she was looking for

^We were out clubbing when one of my girlfriends got drunk and started acting ugly. I stayed away from it. Next morning, I learnt that she had been beaten up and got into a hospital. Well, I think she got what she was looking for.
res4: ^Instead of a thank you, she initiated a fight. I gave her a couple of slaps
^We were out clubbing when one of my girlfriends got drunk and started acting ugly. I harshly shamed her, and she started fighting me. I gave her a couple of slaps.
